main event: A UFO report from Mauch Chunk, PA, on July 29, 1952, involved 6 civilians witnessing an object observed to move in an elliptical orbit, accompanied by sightings of a CET flight and two B-17 crews.
interesting points: The object was observed to give off a yellow to reddish light and appeared as a shiny, black, round, or elliptical shape
There was reported collaboration by the FBI and interest by the Air Force, indicating the significance of the sighting
The object was seen to change from a bright red to a blue-green color, and was described as motionless and positively changing in size
Several witnesses, including a radio operator and a reservist, observed the object and observed it for extended periods with the naked eye and binoculars
The report included detailed witness observations, weather conditions, and other questionnaire-based data
witnesses: 6 civilians, a radio operator, a reservist, and a reporter
photographs: no photographs were mentioned in the report
